name: Fruit-o-Rang
description:
---Welcome to Fruit-o-rang v1.04---

                    Code, art and idea 100% me

--Controls--

{tap to start the game}

{click screen to throw fruit}

{collect the correct fruits and powerups}

{use arrows to move up and down}

--How To Play--

{start the game... click to throw fruit at the right fruit to collect time.  if you hits the wrong one you lose time.

once you are out of time the game ends and tells you your score and then resets}

--Notes--

{there are 2 powerups}

{clocks give you time}

{there 5 fruits}

--Fixed Bugs--

-fixed bug where player fruit would destroy all fruits on game end

-fixed layering issue
